lines.text: Go swallow a germ you nigger cop!

you've moved to the sewer. You're a child molester. And this isn't the first time we have had you in here before you where guilty then and mister your guilty now. And one last thing you smart mouth punk if the department doesn't question the color of his skin you damn well see you don't!
Let's go, Markell, you're going downtown.
I ain't gonna talk to you there, either.
Well now, you don't have to. Shelton copped out, told me the whole story, he said you stabbed the guy and shot him three times, once in the right temple.
He said it was your show, all he did was throw the mustard power in his face, just wanted to roll him, but you were so geed up you had to cut him open.
I'd like to tell you right now why I killed them.
Because they asked me to. They said they'd rather die than live with me.

[busts the kitchen door with the suspect hiding behind it knocks him down crook goes for his gun Friday has his pointed at his nose]
Go ahead pick it up.
I'm afraid we have bad news for you.
My brother he is in jail.
No sir he's dead,someone killed him.
Charles dead killed. He was struck by automobile.
